Trade/Device Name(s): Alere BinaxNOW Influenza A & B Card 2
Alere BinaxNOW Influenza A & B Card 2 Control Swab Kit
Regulation Name(s): Influenza virus antigen detection test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere BinaxNOW Influenza A & B Card 2 and Alere Reader system for rapid qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens using immunochromatographic assay.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid differential diagnosis of influenza A and B viral infections via qualitative detection of nucleoprotein antigens in nasopharyngeal and nasal swab specimens, with negative results to be confirmed by molecular assay or cell culture and not used as sole basis for clinical decisions.
